@jina @danv29 @piccalilli_ Agreed. Our approach at @JamstackConf is: - This is our honorarium for all speakers - If you can't accept it, which charity would you like it donating to? That helps us treat all fairly, and avoid over-indexing on speakers from an org who would otherwise make it free for us.
